summary: Fixes location of Map Marker so when re-discovering the town it will be discovered before entering the town.
descriptionHtml:
If you ever used the "tmm 0" console command which makes all the map markers in the game unfound you may have realized how when you went back to Helgen that you didn't discover the town until you entered it. This mod will fix the location of Map Marker so when re-discovering the town it will be discovered before entering the town. If you want the Skyrim Special Edition version go [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/1004/?]here[/url]

Requirements
Skyrim

To install just download then extract folder and drag plugin into your data folder.
author: LegoManIAm94
